titles.title: A resolution recognizing the 100th anniversary of the creation of the Purdue "All-American" Marching Band's World's Largest Drum.
A resolution recognizing the 100th anniversary of the creation of the Purdue "All-American" Marching Band's World's Largest Drum.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: This resolution expresses the sense of the Senate that the Purdue "All-American" Marching Band, which is celebrating the 100th anniversary of the construction of the World's Largest Drum, continues to remain an important cultural and historical icon of Purdue University and the state of Indiana.
